name: Dragon in the City
description:
I've been wanting to make a pixel based game for some time now, and I guess this is the best opportunity to jump head first into coding.

This is my entry for the Make-A-Level GameJam.

Movement :  WASD keys/arrow keys, and spacebar.

  • Fair warning: it's loud, and I think I broke the volume while coding.

All pixel assets were created by me (PositiveAttitude).
